The episodes are texted with English for hearing impaired - very annoying. Example; it's texted when somebody yawns, coughs, applauds, when music plays etc. >:|
hi, do you have season 3 available.

This is wonderfull stuff. I haven't seen anything of it before, so it's really entertaining. A sheme I wasn't born when this was on the air, it's one of the best crime/detective series around. Pierce is made for the part, and the story's are great. Seeding this for over a month now.
